name: Merchants of Space: Intergalactic Space Outpost
name_original: Merchants of Space: Intergalactic Space Outpost
description:
Set out to the unknown regions of the intergalactic outpost in outer space and start building your own striving intergalactic trade hub. Test your trading skills and expand your outpost beyond the Milky Way in this exciting strategy manager game. Explore the galaxy and pursue intergalactic trading with your outpost over many solar systems - each with merchants of their own traits!

Colonize the unknown
- Immerse yourself in the limitless possibilities of the outer crazy space with countless wonders to explore for your merchants. Build and improve your space station outpost, manage your resources and trade with others to extend your outer space outpost.

Build a colorful intergalactic empire
- Build lively spaceport outposts filled with travelers from all over the galaxy, buzzing factories, fancy bars, galactic casinos, crazy space station outposts and much more!

Sell crazy goods
- Produce countless products and develop new technologies for your intergalactic crazy space station outpost. Create different factory machines, spaceships, even null gravity tentacle hamsters!

Trade with trusty friends and shady aliens
- Meet unique characters and trade your outpost goods with them. From friendly customers to evil creatures of outer space, you can bargain with anyone to gain coins and valuable resources.

Compete with others
- Compete with thousands of players in the Federation leaderboard! Join the weekly competitions to earn crazy space treasures and special bonuses.
